title: Project Planning and Management
description: Define project scope, objectives, timelines, and resource requirements. Set up project management tools and processes.

title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis
description: Conduct market research, gather requirements from stakeholders, and analyze existing oil trading systems and data sources.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components for data ingestion, processing, modeling, user interfaces, and system operations. Consider scalability, fault tolerance, security, and performance requirements.

title: Data Pipeline and Storage
description: Design and implement data pipelines for ingesting and storing oil market data from various sources.

title: Predictive Modeling and Analysis
description: Develop machine learning models for predicting oil prices and analyzing market trends.

title: Trading Strategy Optimization
description: Implement algorithms for optimizing trading strategies based on predictive models and market analysis.

title: User Interface and Visualization
description: Design and develop user interfaces for visualizing market data, predictions, and trading strategies.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Implement security measures and ensure compliance with relevant regulations and industry standards.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop test plans, create test cases, and perform various types of testing (unit, integration, performance, etc.).

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up deployment pipelines, configure infrastructure, and manage the production environment.

title: Documentation and Training
description: Create user manuals, technical documentation, and training materials for the system.
